title: Love Junkie
lyrics:
I want you, want you come and chain me
You know what I'm addicted to
No need to let the good vein change me
'Cause I'm a junkie for you
Love junkie, love don't gain

I need you so bad, I taste in

I'll do anything you want me to

I'll use you up, take it all to save me

'Cause I'm a junkie for you

Love junkie, love don't gain

Love junkie, you know when I know, love junkies

Now it's singing, now



Now you're crawling across my pillow

I can hear it in the way you breathe

You push me up, up against the window

'Cause you're just a junkie for me

Love junkie, love junkie

Love junkie, you know when I know, love junkies



Lord I, I ride around, we go

It's always one more, it's always one more

Lord I, I ride around, we go

It's always one more, it's always one more

Love junkie (Love junkie)

Love junkie (Love junkie)

Love junkie (Love junkie)

Love junkie, you know when I know, love junkies

Love junkie (Love junkie)

Love junkie (Love junkie)

Love junkie (Love junkie)

Love junkie, you know when I know, love junkies

[?]

You know when I know, love junkies
